p: The ZIKV clone 7 isolate was named Zika_virus_459148_Meta_Colombia_2016. The third passage of this isolate was titrated (1.25 × 10 7 PFU/ml); 40 μl was inoculated intraperitoneally into 10 newborn mice on postnatal day 1, and control animals were inoculated with culture supernatants of uninfected Vero cells.
